issue.title: [Python] RecordBatch interface improvements
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8277](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8277). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently __eq__, __repr__ of RecordBatch are not implemented.

compute::Take also supports RecordBatch inputs but there's no python wrapper for it.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8277?focusedCommentId=17072229) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6768
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6768>
